name: Patchwork Ego
description:
Due to covid, some of the voice lines will be delayed. We will add them as soon as we're able to!

Three warlocks and a hunter set out on an adventure to save an eldritch creature from evil druids. What could go wrong?

Created for NaNoRenO2022. The assets in the recap are from our previous game "Perfection | Paper-Thin" and were added to allow new readers to enjoy the story without reading it first. They are not part of the jam effort!

Content Warnings: death, violence, violence against animals, burning/fire, bad mental health, themes of addiction, mild swearing
